eu_initiatives:
The Association monitors mainly the following EU matters: 
 
- Transport policy of all modes (road, air, maritime, rail) 
- Customs policy
organisation_name: Finnish Freight Forwarding and Logistics Association - Suomen Huolinta- ja Logistiikkaliitto (FIFFLA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
1. Confederation of Finnish Industries EK  
 
2. Service Sector Employers PALTA  
 
3. FIATA (the International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations)  
 
4. CLECAT (European association for forwarding, transport, logistics and customs services)  
 
5. Nordic Association of Freight Forwarders
